A common task when working on spatio-temporal data frames is aggregating the
observations of some variables, either in space, or in time. To understand it
better, let's consider the fake data set below:

```{r make_data}
set.seed(30101976)
stdata <- expand.grid(letters[1:3], 1:3, 4:6)
stdata <- cbind(stdata, data.frame(replicate(4, sample(1:100, nrow(stdata), TRUE))))
names(stdata) <- c("province", "year", "month", "rainfall", "temperature", "sunshine", "humidity")
```

```{r}
stdata
```
